jobs.title: Software Developer (Full-Stack)
jobs.snippet: At present, efiport is building a new Business Management System. The new application will be web-based and fully designed around the human learner (employee), front to back. As part of our Novi Sad team, you will actively shape the future of efiport and co-decide about the technologies and frameworks used.
jobs.job_description: Proven practical work experience for at least 2 years implementing Node.js / JavaScript-based web applications. Experience with AWS Services like EC2, S3 or Elastic Beanstalk, implementing secure login / SSO mechanisms and building CI/CD-Pipelines with Git or GitLab would be a plus. Plan, develop, and communicate solutions in collaboration with other developers, architects and product managers for our Business Management System. Build user interfaces using the technologies mentioned above and connect to web-services running in the backend. Develop web-services in the backend and connect to 3rd party systems using APIs.

company_info.name: efiport GmbH
company_info.general_info: efiport GmbH is a subsidiary of Frankfurt School of Finance & Management and has been an innovative provider of technology-supported education solutions in Germany for 20 years. We offer solutions for maximised learning efficiency to global concerns, SMEs, and educational institutions, including universities. efiport is growing rapidly and opening a new location in Novi Sad, Serbia. Do you want to grow with us as we build and shape our company for the future?

jobs.title: Commercial and/or Technical Manager
jobs.snippet: The fast-growing international manufacturer of high-quality and sophisticated cardboard packaging, mainly for the food industry, is looking for a new team member in Serbia: Commercial and/or Technical Manager
jobs.job_description: You have expertise in the packaging or FMCG (fast moving consumer goods) industry (or similar) and are willing and motivated to go the extra mile for our customers. You understand production and commercial processes, modern IT tools and feel absolutely comfortable leading teams internally as well as representing Cardbox to our customers. Technical and/or commercial education (diploma of a professional (graphics, printing) school, high school and/or university) and at least 5 years professional experience are preconditions.

company_info.name: Cardbox Packaging Holding
company_info.general_info: Packaging has always had a significant influence on customers decisions. The function of packaging plays an important role at the POS, as well as in the whole supply chain. We are helping you with these decisions by making the perfect packaging! As a packaging company, we are aware we have an important mission to satisfy not only our customers, but also theircustomers. That has always been our number one priority. Let us help with all steps leading to both your and your customers complete satisfaction; from idea to realization.

jobs.title: Application/Data Analyst
jobs.snippet: Finbet d.o.o., an associated company of the international Fincore group is hiring IT professionals for its Belgrade office. To that end, Finbet is seeking for Application/Data Analyst.
jobs.job_description: Deliver a professional, customer focused and high performing support service. To be flexible, as part of the team to provide out of hours on-call support on a 24/7 365 day basis. Take clear ownership and resolution of issues logged against applications/systems and where required escalating to 3rd line support. Provide root cause analysis for critical incidents, and where possible provide suggestions, improvements and best practices to mitigate future incidents. Maintain and improve the online knowledge base and any other support related documentation.

company_info.name: Fincore
company_info.general_info: Fincore’s roots are in risk management for investment banks. We started in the 1980’s. We’ve come a long way since. The company’s directors, Predrag Popovic and Soeren Christensen, met while working in risk management at Nomura International in the late 1980’s. Soon after, they founded Finsoft, to develop innovative, transformational software for the financial services industry. Finsoft also applied its risk management expertise to the gaming industry, creating a market-defining software platform for gaming and sports betting. And it expanded into other sectors, including government and aerospace, through development of business collaboration, process management and workflow software.

jobs.title: Junior Backend Developer
jobs.snippet: We are 75 years strong and still growing. Come grow with us! We are currently looking for: Junior Backend Developer.
jobs.job_description: Coding new developments and / or enhancements as defined in a technical design. Adhere to code quality and unit testing standards. Identify and implement integration test automating tests where appropriate. Participating in reviews of code. Design and delivery of innovative solutions to client needs. Learning and using agile developmental techniques. Creating the delivery of high quality solutions that are validated using approaches such as Test driven development

company_info.name: Crowe RS Advisory d.o.o.
company_info.general_info: Crowe Serbia is one of the leading accounting and consulting firms in Serbia, and direct member of Crowe Global. Ranked the eighth largest accounting network in the world, Crowe Global has over 180 independent accounting and advisory firms in more than 130 countries

jobs.title: HR Administrator
jobs.snippet: Qualis Electronics is the new start up company that operates in the field of electronics manufacturing services (EMS). We are located in the city of Niš, as a part of Austrian group System Industrie Electronic AG, a holding that is globally present in America, Europe and Asia for more than 25 years. Due to the expansion of our local business, we are looking for proactive and highly responsible candidates for the following position: HR Administrator
jobs.job_description: Creates and maintains human resource plans and procedures. Creates all HR documents, from daily operative documents (for absences documentation to the internal decisions publishing) through the Labour Contracts to the internal HR acts. Maintaining HR database, including personal data (employee records) in ERP and creating of various HR reports for the Management. Maintaining good data quality related to trainings and appraisal.

company_info.name: Qualis Electronics
company_info.general_info: Crowe Serbia is one of the leading accounting and consulting firms in Serbia, and direct member of Crowe Global. Ranked the eighth largest accounting network in the world, Crowe Global has over 180 independent accounting and advisory firms in more than 130 countries
company_info.location: Bul. Svetog Cara Konstantina  80-86, 18000 Niš, Serbia

jobs.title: Internship program in the Indirect Purchasing in Technical Service department
jobs.snippet: BizLink is looking for a final year student or recent graduate for the Internship program in the Indirect Purchasing in Technical Service department, for our production facility in Prokuplje. We manufacture cables, wiring harnesses, power cords, connectors and related interconnect devices.
jobs.job_description: Administrative tasks. Monitoring procurement requests. Market research and analysis regarding prices. Records and monitors stock of purchased commodity. Makes evidence and updates the prices of the material. Evaluating of suppliers

company_info.name: Bizlink Technology SRB d.o.o.
company_info.general_info: BizLink, founded in 1996, is headquartered in Silicon Valley, USA. Our very first products were IT industry power cord sets. By developing reliable interconnect solutions for diversified customers, BizLink established itself as a trusted supplier. Since then, BizLink has become more diverse by providing essential components, harnesses and cables to industries such as IT and CE, Motor Vehicle, Electrical Appliances, Medical Equipment, Industrial, Optical Fiber Communications, and Solar. Our mission is to make interconnection easier and to become the leading global interconnect solution provider.

jobs.title: Senior Human Resources Manager
jobs.snippet: We are currently looking for: Senior Human Resources Manager.
jobs.job_description: Senior HR Manager responsibilities include overseeing the local HR processes, designing company policies and setting objectives for the HR team. You will also help shape our employer brand strategy. To be successful in this role, you should be familiar with HR technology, including payroll systems and Applicant Tracking Systems. You will get exposure to many different aspects of the business and have the opportunity to work on international HR projects. Ultimately, you will ensure our company attracts, hires, develops and retains qualified employees. you will enjoy a varied role and a wide range of interactions across all levels on a daily basis.

company_info.name: PrimeVigilance d.o.o.
company_info.general_info: Founded in 1997 by a  Medical Doctor, Ergomed Plc is dedicated to the development of new drugs to save or improve lives. Operating with a global footprint in over 55 countries, Ergomed has the expertise to manage even the most challenging clinical trials.  Ergomed provides services to over 100 clients in a range of therapy areas but excels in the provision of services for  complex trials in Rare Diseases, Oncology and Neuroscience.
company_info.location: PrimeVigilance Ltd 1 Occam Court, Surrey Research Park, USA

jobs.title: Junior Legal Consultant & HR support
jobs.snippet: Reports to: Group Legal Manager, Group Head of HR Department. This position is in support of the company legal and HR activities in order to assure smooth running of the office in accordance with legislation in power and help other departments with legal and HR advise.
jobs.job_description: Legal support. The position holder provides legal consulting on employment and commercial contracts for EIG Serbia; Ensuring compliance with quality standards and the firm’s policies in general. Responsible to ensure the HR procedures are implemented in line with Republic of Serbia regulatory. Takes complains and assures to address them to the responsible departments as well as notify customers. Company documents preparing. Responsible to create and amend legal document and other documentation as per office needs.

company_info.name: Eurolab Internacional Grup d.o.o.
company_info.general_info: Eurolab Internacional Grup was established in 1995, as one of the first importing and distributing companies in Albania. Our product portfolio is extensive from food (pasta, sauces, vinegar, etc), to alcoholic (spirits, beer, champagne, wine), to beverages (water, ice tea, soft drinks, etc). Our products are selected to be unique, they build premium experience for all customer demands, either traditional, or those having dietary needs. Our distribution footprint has grown exponentially from a region in Albania, to now covering all of Western Balkans, in Europe.
company_info.location: Bulevar Dr. Zorana Đinđića 64A, 11070 Novi Beograd, Srbija

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.snippet: Attention talented individual! This is not just another job posting. We are on the move – and want to keep moving. We are farsighted. We are proactive. We are courageous. We are TX.
jobs.job_description: Collaborate with designers, product managers and other team members in an agile environment. Translate of visual designs into pixel-perfect components in React. Develop reusable react components to be used across the company. Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. Ensure responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility across devices/screen sizes.

company_info.name: TX Services
company_info.general_info: TX Services is the new product, design and engineering center of Switzerland's TX Group in Belgrade. TX Group is the largest media and advertising house in Switzerland, with almost 50% of all Swiss consumer internet traffic passing across it's websites and apps.

jobs.title: English Speaking Sales Associate
jobs.snippet: We are looking for: English Speaking Sales Associate (Remote position - Serbia).
jobs.job_description: Contact innovation and HR managers in large firms in Europe by phone and e-mail. Discuss our events with future guests. Build long term customer relationships with attendees.

company_info.name: Innovation Roundtable®
company_info.general_info: Innovation Roundtable is an events company based in Copenhagen which facilitates links between innovation managers, in a setting where they can learn about best practices from executive speakers, discuss selected innovation topics, and share experiences with peers. We are a team of international, enthusiastic and passionate people who work from all over the world.

jobs.title: Market Research Associate (Internship)
jobs.snippet: We are looking for: Market Research Associate (Internship)
jobs.job_description: Assist in the development of the target market report, highlighting key customer opportunities, target contacts and the overall market revenue opportunity by vertical and region. Deep insight into the market opportunity, competitive landscape, key accounts, key contacts, including defining tyntec’s strategic value to all key accounts and contacts. Consistently deliver high quality, accurate contact data to the Sales team by leveraging online research tools. Assist in the development of strategic account plans for tyntec’s key target accounts.

company_info.name: tyntec d.o.o.
company_info.general_info: tyntec is a global cloud communications company enabling businesses to communicate with their customers, workforce and machines. tyntec has built its global connectivity from the ground up and developed cloud APIs on top to provide full advantage of cloud communications on a global scale.Building on its heritage of tier-one global SMS messaging provider, tyntec continues to advance how today’s enterprises utilize the universal services of messaging, voice and phone numbers to connect and perform transactions with people around the world.
company_info.location: Farringdon St. London EC4A 4AB, United Kingdom
